headline: Boston Scientific announces participation in the J.P. Morgan Healthcare Conference and conference call discussing fourth quarter and full year 2025 results
summary: Boston Scientific Corporation (NYSE: BSX) will participate in the 44th Annual J.P. Morgan Healthcare Conference on Tuesday, January 13th, 2026, in San Francisco. Mike Mahoney, chairman and chief executive officer, Jon Monson, executive vice president and chief financial officer, and Ken Stein, M.D., senior vice president and global chief medical officer, will participate in a 40-minute question-and-answer session with the host analyst. The session will begin at approximately 9:00 a.m. PT / 12:00
